conbody.p: XML Parser processoroverviewprocessorsXML ParserThe XML Parser parses a well-formed XML document embedded in a string field and passes the parsed data to an output field in the record.

The XML Parser can create multiple records from an XML document based on a user-defined delimiter element. When defining the delimiter element, you can use an XML element or simplified XPath expression.
When no delimiter element is defined, XML Parser reads the entire contents of the field as a single record.
For more information about how XML Parser processes XML data, see .
